content: **knitted cloths with garter stitch in drops safran ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no e-319 yarn group a ------------------------------------------------------- **size** 1 cloth measures approx 24 x 24 cm **materials** drops safran from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 50 g colour 57 mauve 50 g colour 56 powder pink 50 g colour 01 desert rose 1 cloth weighs approx 30 g needles drops singel pointed needles size 3 5 mm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size **knitting gauge** 23 stitches in width and 45 row in height with garter stitch = 10 x 10 cm
